__e: An ex-boxer who lived in the US a while.
He-He was a - He was a homeless man, and he was an ex-boxer... and, I don't know, I thought it was a good story.
Did you write to him because you read in the paper, about a boxer who was going to spend the rest of life in prison?
Or am I this old pug who's just tryin' to replace old pain with new pain?
You need confidence for this - you have to walk decisively, or like a boxer in the ring.
He just said there was a time... where you could have been the best boxer in the world.
